src:
Ditekuk Bournemouth, Manchester United Panen Olokan Kocak
03 Nov 2019, 22:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Terhentinya tren kemenangan Manchester United di tangan Bournemouth membuat pasukan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer itu panen olokan-olokan yang kocak dari netizen.
Bermain di pekan ke-11 Premier League di Vitality Stadium, Sabtu (2/11/2019) kemarin, United tunduk dengan skor 1-0. Gol tunggal Bournemouth dicetak oleh Joshua King pada menit ke-45.
Kekalahan itu langsung memupus optimisme yang sempat menyapa fans MU. Sebelumnya fans Setan Merah mulai percaya diri setelah tim kesayangan mereka mendulang tiga kemenangan beruntun. Menariknya, tiga kemenangan itu diraih di kandang lawan.
Sebelumnya, MU membungkam Partizan 1-0 di Liga Europa, menang 3-1 atas Norwich City di Premier League, dan mengalahkan Chelsea 2-1 di Piala Liga Inggris.
Kegagalan Manchester United tersebut tentu saja membuat ramai dunia maya. Unggahan maupun meme yang berisi olok-olokan untuk Manchester United langsung membanjiri dunia maya. Seperti apa olokan-olokan itu? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Bend Down Bournemouth, Manchester United Harvest Amusing Funny
Nov 3 2019, 22:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The cessation of Manchester United's winning trend at the hands of Bournemouth makes Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's troops harvest hilarious jokes from netizens.
Playing in the 11th week of the Premier League at Vitality Stadium on Saturday (11/02/2019) yesterday, United were subject to a score of 1-0. Bournemouth's single goal scored by Joshua King in the 45th minute.
The defeat immediately dispelled the optimism that could greet MU fans. Previously the Red Devils fans began to feel confident after their favorite team to gain three consecutive wins. Interestingly, the three wins were won at home to the opponent.
Previously, MU silenced Partizan 1-0 in the Europa League, won 3-1 over Norwich City in the Premier League, and beat Chelsea 2-1 in the English League Cup.
The failure of Manchester United, of course, makes the virtual world crowded. Uploads and memes containing ridicule for Manchester United immediately flooded the virtual world. What is the joke like? See below.
